Address: Rivermark Village, 3906 Rivermark Plaza, Santa Clara, CA 95054, USA

column4: A salty, sweet and sinful blend of caramel and red Hawaiian sea salt.
A spellbinding combination of chocolate and OREO® cookies.
Go wild with this creamy shake made from banana purée and Hershey's® chocolate syrup and topped with chocolate banana sauce.
An all-ages version of our Caribbean classic! Coconut cream, pineapple juice and soft serve blended to creamy perfection. Garnished with a fresh slice of pineapple.
A creamy blend of strawberries, bananas and grenadine. Sip to the beat of your heart—or a steel-drum band.
